wikipedia_page.main: Anna Arrowsmith (born Anna Imogen Thompson 15 January 1972), who works under the pseudonym Anna Span, is a former English pornographic film director and producer. She makes frequent public appearances, speaking on sex, pornography and feminism, though not without significant opposition from some feminists.

response: * Anna Arrowsmith (born 1972), under the pseudonym Anna Span, British pornographic film director and politician
